messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Death linked to Pearls' advice...
messages.msgSnippet:
That was horrible.  I am going to make sure that that book isn t in my
church library!  There will be a fight on their hands if anything by these
people is
messages.messageBody:
That was horrible. I am going to make sure that that book isn't in my
church library! There will be a fight on their hands if anything by these
people is there.

Lesa

-------Original Message-------

From: John & Karen Buxcel
Date: 03/17/06 10:53:48
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Death linked to Pearls' advice...

I thought this beautiful little child deserved a moment of our time.

Another life affirming moment that reminds us that gentle parenting and
unschooling are absolutely the right path.


Michael and Debi Pearl are the authors of "To Train up a Child," a
horrific book on child rearing.


http://www.newsobserver.com/102/story/418676.html


Read it, then go hug your kids ...

Namaste~
Karen
